item.title: Emergency brain
item.description: Thank goodness I have a functioning emergency brain. I've never needed to know that I even had one, much less whether or not it worked, until the unfortunate events of the past few weeks unfolded. My Dad was in a very unfortunate accident at work. Rather than bandy on about it here, I'll send you to the site we've created to share the news (my Dad has a rather large fan club.;) ). http://mike.haaser.com
